mapper.select: SELECT sm.id, sm.parent_id, sm.`level`, sm.`name` menuName, sm.sort, sm.url, sm.icon ,sm1.id id1, sm1.parent_id parentId1, sm1.`level` level1, sm1.`name` menuName1, sm1.sort sort1, sm1.url url1, sm1.icon icon1 ,sm2.id id2, sm2.parent_id parentId2, sm2.`level` level2, sm2.`name` menuName2, sm2.sort sort2, sm2.url url2, sm2.icon icon2 ,sm3.id id3, sm3.parent_id parentId3, sm3.`level` LEVEL3, sm3.`name` menuName3, sm3.sort sort3, sm3.url url3, sm3.icon icon3 FROM ad_sys_menu sm LEFT JOIN ad_sys_menu sm1 ON sm1.parent_id = sm.id LEFT JOIN ad_sys_menu sm2 ON sm2.parent_id = sm1.id LEFT JOIN ad_sys_menu sm3 ON sm3.parent_id = sm2.id WHERE sm.`level` = 0 AND sm.parent_id = 0 ORDER BY sm.sort ASC, sm1.sort ASC, sm2.sort ASC , sm3.sort ASC
SELECT sm.id, sm.parent_id, sm.`level`, sm.`name` menuName, sm.sort, sm.url, sm.icon FROM ad_sys_menu sm ORDER BY sm.parent_id
